title: 小白求解
author: 野原丶晓白
txt_content:

replies.author: 新手求教
replies.txt_content:
野原丶晓白 发表于 2013-1-8 18:56

replies.author: cyw06061
replies.txt_content:
server的不是叫mod，
是叫插件，英文是plugins

replies.txt_content:

mods文件需要先装forge
你这里有么
